app_descript:
App Name: My Town: Airport App Package Name: mytown.airport.free

Brief

Lift off to an exciting adventure with "My Town: Airport"! Experience the thrill of the airport without leaving your home. This interactive simulation game expands the My Town universe with over NINE vibrant locations to explore, from bustling shops to cozy airport lounges. Perfect for young explorers aged 4-12, the game encourages creativity, with a plethora of activities and secrets tucked away for the curious mind to discover. Ready for takeoff?

In "My Town: Airport," kids can take the role of traveler, pilot, or even an air steward, curating their own stories and engaging with an animated world that encourages creativity and role-playing. The sky's the limit as they navigate this safe and family-friendly airport adventure!
